product_name: BIC Sport Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Small Blade
long_description: The small-blade BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling. Small blade is ideal for smaller paddlers, kids, and those who prefer a high-cadence paddling style. Aluminum shaft provides a reliable connection to the water and high value; the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts from 59 - 75 in. Adjustable length is also ideal for multiple paddlers. Blade shape pulls smoothly through the water. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: The small-blade BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling.
